title: Jack Planck FONT ID
content:
Anybody familiar with this script font used to spell out “Jack Planck”? Thanks,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006194845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/7_5854.jpg)

 [‹ jeopardy screen typeface???](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006194845/http:/typophile.com/node/44805 "Go to previous forum topic") [BecksBeer.com help? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006194845/http:/typophile.com/node/44828 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content: [Sydney](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006194845/http:/www.identifont.com/show?LWR) seem quite close. [Studio Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006194845/http:/www.identifont.com/show?376) has some similarities, too.
